Hi Hinano,
I am sorry that we have never had the opportunity to meet each other face-to-face but I hope you had a great holiday.
I am wri�ng on behalf of my wife and myself as tenants in #302. We are, unfortunately, in a posi�on in which it is not appropriate for

Subject: Fw: Pacific Crest Real Estate Introduction
From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>
To: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>
Date Sent: Tuesday, December 26, 2023 4:53:28 PM GMT-08:00
Date Received: Tuesday, December 26, 2023 4:53:29 PM GMT-08:00
Attachments: Alki Surf Introduction English.pdf,Alki Surf Introduction Letter.pdf
From: Hinano Kaaialii <pacificcrest-mail-system@pacificcrest.mailer.appfolio.us>
Sent: Thursday, September 7, 2023 12:38 PM
To: rob.moyer@gmail.com <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

Good afternoon, all,
Thank you very much for the warm welcome to our beautiful Alki Surf Property. My name is Hinano and I will be your new
point of contact. Both Tina and Francis have worked long and hard and are ready for the retired life. Please direct all
inquiries and questions to my self.
It was an absolute pleasure to meet some of you yesterday. To those of you who I did not get a chance to meet, I look
forward to meeting you in the near future! I have attached an electronic version of a few introduction sheets for your
reference.
We humbly ask that you fill out the tenant information sheet located in the Alki Surf Introduction Letter attachment and send
back via email, it would allow us to better serve you all with accurate records.
We will also be setting you up with our online property management app known as AppFolio. When you do receive the
email/text to set up, go ahead and work through those links to set up your portal. You can also download the app on your
phone to make the process a little quicker to access your portal. You will be able to make all payments through the appfolio
portal. You will also be able to place work orders through your portal as well. Any issues in your apartment can be reported
through a work order and we can get you taken cared of ASAP.
Thank you all again for the warm welcome. Looking forward to a smooth transition process. Please do not hesitate to reach
out to me should you have any questions or concerns.
Best,
Hinano Kaaialii/ Property Manager
Pacific Crest Real Estate
200 1st Avenue W, Ste.520
Seattle, WA 98119

IE: hinano.kaaialii@pacificcrestre.com
“An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure”
Benjamin Franklin

Good afternoon, all,
Thank you very much for the warm welcome to our beautiful Alki Surf Property. My name is Hinano and I will be your new
point of contact. Both Tina and Francis have worked long and hard and are ready for the retired life. Please direct all
inquiries and questions to my self.
It was an absolute pleasure to meet some of you yesterday. To those of you who I did not get a chance to meet, I look
forward to meeting you in the near future! I have attached an electronic version of a few introduction sheets for your
reference.
We humbly ask that you fill out the tenant information sheet located in the Alki Surf Introduction Letter attachment and send
back via email, it would allow us to better serve you all with accurate records.
We will also be setting you up with our online property management app known as AppFolio. When you do receive the
email/text to set up, go ahead and work through those links to set up your portal. You can also download the app on your
phone to make the process a little quicker to access your portal. You will be able to make all payments through the appfolio
portal. You will also be able to place work orders through your portal as well. Any issues in your apartment can be reported

Thank you all again for the warm welcome. Looking forward to a smooth transition process. Please do not hesitate to reach

200 1st Avenue W, Ste.520

From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>
To: Christine Moyer <christinemoyer@hotmail.com>
Date Sent: Thursday, November 9, 2023 3:56:01 PM GMT-08:00
Hey- You supplied me with the BoFa info but I can't figure out how to transfer. There is no place to do that. It looks like you
almost have to use it specifically to "pay a bill". There is nowhere to enter a routing number. Only a place to look up names
for people you may owe money to. It may be limited on purpose, but I am sure we can figure something out.
Thoughts:
I'll keep this up, so we can count on just under ~1k a week from it
We can have me pay a bill or happy to see if I can give you access
We could also just withdraw cash and move it that way I also assume
Maybe we sit together and you tell me how you want to handle it w

Subject: Unemployment Benefits
From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>
To: Christine Moyer <christinemoyer@hotmail.com>
Date Sent: Tuesday, November 7, 2023 1:56:51 PM GMT-08:00
Last night I thought you said, "you have not even signed up for unemployment". Maybe I misheard, as I am sure you know I
have. I was sitting on the couch with you, and we discussed it as I did it. Either way, I have, and as I understand, while we
are still pooling everything, that needs to go to pay our bills. We get ~1k a week, and obviously, I have not touched a dime.
Please let me know where I need to move it (BOFA routing number?) so you can use it for our expenses and I will try and
set that up. Or I can provide the account info to you if that is more helpful. If we can't figure that out, you gave me the ATM
card where it is stored, and I assume we can just withdraw it and deposit it. Regardless, it's still the family's income
(correct?)
It's all there, but the website is down, or I'd share the balance screenshot. Just let me know!
